file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: Unit of Measure Service description: > This is a generated connector for [SAPS4HANA Intelligent Trade Claims Management API v1.0.0](https://help.sap.com/viewer/902b9d277dfe48fea582d28849d54935/CURRENT/en-US) OpenAPI specification. The unit of measure service allows you to load units of measure for various purposes in SAPS4HANA Intelligent Trade Claims Management. x-ballerina-init-description: > The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. Create and configure an OAuth2 client credentials by following [this guide](https://help.sap.com/viewer/b865ed651e414196b39f8922db2122c7/LATEST/en-US/7aefa21a65f94b25b7e639c3931b6f83.html). x-ballerina-display: label: SAPS4HANA ITCM Unit of Measure iconPath: "icon.png" license: name: SAP version: 1.0.0 externalDocs: description: Business Documentation for Unit of Measure Service url: https://help.sap.com/viewer/902b9d277dfe48fea582d28849d54935/CURRENT/en-US/5e09d4c1178148899a0b6f91c632208e.html security: - OAuth2: [] tags: - name: Unit of Measure paths: /uom: post: tags: - Unit of Measure summary: Create a new Unit of Measure description: Using this API, user can create a Unit of Measure. As of now, batch creation is not supported operationId: createUoM requestBody: description: Request payolad to create a new Unit of Measure content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/UoMStoreDTO' required: true responses: '201': description: Success Created. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUoMMessage' '401': description: Unauthorized. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage' '403': description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization). content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage' deprecated: false security: - OAuth2: [] /uom/{isocode}/{languageKey}: get: tags: - Unit of Measure summary: Get Unit of Measure description: Using this api, user can get a particular Unit of Measure using {isocode} and {languageKey} operationId: getByISOLangKey parameters: - name: isocode in: path description: Isocode required: true schema: maxLength: 3 minLength: 0 type: string - name: languageKey in: path description: LanguageKey required: true schema: maxLength: 2 minLength: 0 type: string responses: '200': description: OK. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/UoMResponseDTO' '401': description: Unauthorized. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage' '403': description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization). content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage' '404': description: Not Found. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseNotFoundMessage' deprecated: false security: - OAuth2: [] delete: tags: - Unit of Measure summary: Delete Unit of Measure description: Using this api, user can get a particular Unit of Measure using {isocode} and {languageKey} operationId: deleteByISOLangKey parameters: - name: isocode in: path description: Isocode required: true schema: maxLength: 3 minLength: 0 type: string - name: languageKey in: path description: LanguageKey required: true schema: maxLength: 2 minLength: 0 type: string responses: '200': description: OK. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUoMMessage' '401': description: Unauthorized. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage' '403': description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization). content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage' '404': description: Not Found. content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseNotFoundMessage' deprecated: false security: - OAuth2: [] components: schemas: ResponseDeleteAll: title: ResponseDeleteAll type: object properties: count: type: integer format: int32 message: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time ResponseMessage: title: ResponseMessage type: object properties: message: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time uri: type: string ResponseNotFoundMessage: type: object example: message: There is no data found based on the given inputs. error: No Result Found timestamp: '2021-01-18T19:37:13.701+00:00' properties: message: type: string error: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time title: Not Found Message ResponseForbiddenMessage: type: object example: message: Access denied timestamp: '2021-01-18T18:33:18.914Z' properties: message: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time uri: type: string title: Forbidden Message ResponseUnauthorizedMessage: type: object example: message: Unauthorized/API key not found timestamp: '2021-01-18T18:33:18.914Z' properties: message: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time uri: type: string title: Unauthorized Message ResponseUoMMessage: title: ResponseUoMMessage type: object example: languageKey: EN unitOfMeasureISO: T006I message: Success created timestamp: '2021-01-18T18:33:18.914Z' properties: langKey: type: string message: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time unitOfMeasureISO: type: string UoMResponseDTO: title: UoMResponseDTO type: object properties: languageKey: type: string example: EN unitDescription: type: string example: Units of Measurement unitText: type: string example: T006J UoMStoreDTO: title: UoMStoreDTO type: object example: businessSystem: '0' unitOfMeasureCode: T006 unitOfMeasureCodeISO: T006I unitText: T006J unitDescription: Units of Measurement languageKey: EN numberOfDecimals: 2 properties: businessSystem: type: string languageKey: type: string numberOfDecimals: type: integer format: int32 unitDescription: type: string unitOfMeasureCode: type: string unitOfMeasureCodeISO: type: string unitText: type: string UoMStoreResponse: title: UoMStoreResponse type: object properties: message: type: string timestamp: type: string format: date-time uomStoreData: type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/UoMStoreDTO' securitySchemes: OAuth2: type: oauth2 description: To use this API, you need to get OAuth client credentials (client ID, secret, and geolocation) from SAP ITCM, and be authorized to use the relevant scope. Refer to the full authentication information for more information. flows: clientCredentials: tokenUrl: https://colgate-dev1.authentication.us30.hana.ondemand.com/oauth/token scopes: {} x-sap-shortText: The Unit of Measure service represent unit of measure that can be posted to, deleted or queried from SAP Intelligent Trade Claims Management by a user.
